text:
1. NASA selects 3 Indian companies to make COVID-19 ventilators:

- Alpha Design Technologies
- Bharat Forge
- Medha Servo Drives.

2. India overtakes Japan with fifth-largest hydropower capacity in the world.

3. US President Donald Trump wants India to be included in G7 summit.
